Steam (ST): There's only one place you'll find that word on Rokkenjima.
Umineko Project (UP): There's only one place you'll find that word on Rokkenjima.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There's only one place you'll find that word on Rokkenjima.
PC Japanese (JP): それが刻まれた場所が、六軒島に一ヶ所だけある。
Russian (RU): На Роккенджиме это слово есть только в одном месте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tem apenas um lugar em Rokkenjima onde você vai encontrar essa palavra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在六軒島上，只有一處有著這行字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在六轩岛上，只有一处有着这行字。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): C'è un solo posto dove si può trovare quella parola su Rokkenjima.

Steam (ST): Gold butterflies flitted from shadow to shadow, dodging raindrops.
Umineko Project (UP): Gold butterflies flitted from shadow to shadow, dodging raindrops.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gold butterflies flitted from shadow to shadow, dodging raindrops.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金蝶が梢の陰から陰へ、小雨を避けながら、ひらりと飛ぶ。
Russian (RU): Золотые бабочки пролетели от тени до тени, избегая капель дождя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Borboletas douradas esvoaçavam de sombra em sombra, esquivando‐se dos pingos de chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金蝶在樹梢下穿梭，邊躲避小雨，邊輕快飛舞。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金蝶在树梢下穿梭，边躲避小雨，边轻快飞舞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Farfalle dorate aleggiarono di ombra in ombra, schivando le gocce di pioggia.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...Unless my memory is mistaken, this is probably the place."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Unless my memory is mistaken, this is probably the place."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……妾の記憶が間違っていなければ、確かここで見た覚えがある。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……妾の記憶が間違っていなければ、確かここで見た覚えがある」
Russian (RU): "......Если не ошибаюсь, наверное, здесь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......A não ser que a minha memória esteja enganada, provavelmente é neste lugar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……妾身的記憶要是沒出錯的話，那妾身記得，確實就是在這兒看到過。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……妾身的记忆要是没出错的话，那妾身记得，确实就是在这儿看到过。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... A meno che la memoria non mi inganni, probabilmente il posto è questo."

Steam (ST): It was...the chapel. That mysterious building, one of the oldest on Rokkenjima, which had been built at the same time as the mansion.
Umineko Project (UP): It was......the chapel.{n}That mysterious building, one of the oldest on Rokkenjima, which had been built at the same time as the mansion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was......the chapel. That mysterious building, one of the oldest on Rokkenjima, which had been built at the same time as the mansion.
PC Japanese (JP): そこは、……礼拝堂だった。六軒島に屋敷と同時に最も古く建てられた、謎多き建物だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そこは、……礼拝堂だった。{n}六軒島に屋敷と同時に最も古く建てられた、謎多き建物だ。
Russian (RU): ......Часовня.{n}Таинственная постройка — одна из старейших на Роккенджиме, — которую построили одновременно с особняком.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era......a capela.{n}A misteriosa edificação, uma das mais antigas de Rokkenjima, que foi construída ao mesmo tempo que a mansão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這裡是，……禮拜堂。{n}是與六軒島大屋同時最早在島上建造的，有著許多謎的建築物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这里是，……礼拜堂。{n}是与六轩岛大屋同时最早在岛上建造的，有着许多谜的建筑物。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era... la cappella. Quella misteriosa costruzione, una delle più vecchie su Rokkenjima, che era stata costruita insieme alla villa.

Steam (ST): It was called the chapel, but not once had Kinzo used it for worship, and the members of the family had never been allowed inside.
Umineko Project (UP): It was called the chapel, but not once had Kinzo used it for worship, and the members of the family had never been allowed inside.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was called the chapel, but not once had Kinzo used it for worship, and the members of the family had never been allowed inside.
PC Japanese (JP): 礼拝堂と名は付いているが、金蔵が礼拝に使った試しは一度もなく、親族たちに立ち入らせたことも一度も無い。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 礼拝堂と名は付いているが、金蔵が礼拝に使ったためしは一度もなく、親族たちに立ち入らせたことも一度も無い。
Russian (RU): Она называлась часовней, но Кинзо ни разу не молился в ней, а членам семьи не разрешалось туда входить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era chamada de capela, mas nunca foi usada por Kinzo para orações, bem como os membros da família não tinham permissão para entrar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖有個禮拜堂的名字，但金藏從未去做過禮拜，並且一次都未允許過親族們踏入。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽有个礼拜堂的名字，但金藏从未去做过礼拜，并且一次都未允许过亲族们踏入。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era chiamata cappella, ma nemmeno una volta Kinzo l'aveva usata per culto, e ai membri della famiglia non era permesso entrare dentro.

Steam (ST): There were strict orders that none approach it without reason, and its purpose has always been a mystery.
Umineko Project (UP): There were strict orders that none approach it without reason, and its purpose was always a mystery.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There were strict orders that none approach it without reason, and its purpose has always been a mystery.
PC Japanese (JP): 濫りに近付くべからずと厳命され、何のために建てられたのか、ずっと謎に思われてきた。
Russian (RU): Был строгий приказ не приближаться к ней без причины, и её назначение всегда оставалось загадкой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Haviam ordens estritas para que ninguém se aproximasse dela sem um motivo e seu propósito sempre foi um mistério.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被過度嚴命“不准靠近”後，“都是為了什麼才建它的”，一直都被人當成了一個謎。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被过度严命“不准靠近”后，“都是为了什么才建它的”，一直都被人当成了一个谜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): C'era l'ordine severo che nessuno vi ci avvicinasse senza ragione, e il suo scopo era sempre stato un mistero.

Steam (ST): However, all of these mysteries got boring after several decades.
Umineko Project (UP): However, any mystery will lose its luster after several decades.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, all of these mysteries got boring after several decades.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、どんな謎も、数十年という長い時間の間には色褪せる。
Russian (RU): Но все эти тайны спустя несколько десятилетий наскучили.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, todo e qualquer mistério perde seu esplendor após algumas décadas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，不論怎樣的謎，都是會在長達幾十年的漫長時間中慢慢褪色的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，不论怎样的谜，都是会在长达几十年的漫长时间中慢慢褪色的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, tutti questi misteri vennero a noia, dopo diversi decenni.

Steam (ST): At some point, everyone forgot the chapel even existed, and that splendid building passed from the thoughts of Rokkenjima's residents...
Umineko Project (UP): At some point, everyone forgot the chapel even existed, and that splendid building passed from the thoughts of Rokkenjima's residents......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At some point, everyone forgot the chapel even existed, and that splendid building passed from the thoughts of Rokkenjima's residents......
PC Japanese (JP): いつしか、礼拝堂という存在も忘れられ、これほどに立派な建物なのに、六軒島の住人たちからは忘れ去られていた……。
Russian (RU): В какой‐то момент все забыли о том, что вообще есть такая часовня, и больше никто на Роккенджиме не думал об этом здании......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em determinado momento, todos esqueceram da existência da capela, e esta edificação maravilhosa desapareceu dos pensamentos dos residentes de Rokkenjima......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不知不覺，就連禮拜堂的存在都被遺忘了，明明是幢如此雄偉的建築物，可它卻被六軒島上的居民們給忘了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不知不觉，就连礼拜堂的存在都被遗忘了，明明是幢如此雄伟的建筑物，可它却被六轩岛上的居民们给忘了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ad un certo punto, tutti si dimenticarono persino della sua esistenza, e quella splendida costruzione passò di mente agli abitanti di Rokkenjima...

Steam (ST): Of course, this had been true for Beato as well.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, this had been true for Beato as well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, this had been true for Beato as well.
PC Japanese (JP): 無論、それはベアトもだった。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, Беато тоже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, isso também valia para Beato.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，這點對於貝阿朵也是一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，这点对于贝阿朵也是一样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ovviamente, questo valeva anche per Beato.

Steam (ST): Beato, who hated boredom, had no desire to approach places that humans never went.
Umineko Project (UP): Beato, who hated boredom, had no desire to approach places that humans never went.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato, who hated boredom, had no desire to approach places that humans never went.
PC Japanese (JP): 退屈を嫌うベアトは、人の立ち入らない場所には好んで近寄らない。
Russian (RU): Она ненавидела скуку и не желала приближаться к тем местам, в которые люди никогда не ходят.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela, aquela que odiava o tédio e não tinha desejo algum de aproximar‐se de locais frequentados por humanos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怕悶的貝阿朵，可不會自己跑去沒人進得去的地方。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怕闷的贝阿朵，可不会自己跑去没人进得去的地方。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beato, che odiava la noia, non aveva desiderio nell'avvicinarsi a posti in cui gli umani non andavano mai.

Steam (ST): Her last memory was of the time she went in there to taunt Shannon as she tried to clean.
Umineko Project (UP): Her last memory of the place was of the time she went in there to taunt Shannon as she tried to clean.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her last memory was of the time she went in there to taunt Shannon as she tried to clean.
PC Japanese (JP): 以前、礼拝堂の掃除をする紗音をからかった時に出入りをしたのが、最後の記憶だった。
Russian (RU): Её последним воспоминанием было время, когда она пошла туда посмеяться над Шаннон, когда та убиралась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua última memória do local era da época que ela foi lá para provocar Shannon enquanto ela fazia a limpeza.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 以前戲耍打掃禮拜堂的紗音的那一次，是她記憶中的最後一次。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 以前戏耍打扫礼拜堂的纱音的那一次，是她记忆中的最后一次。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il suo ultimo ricordo era il momento in cui era andata lì per prendere in giro Shannon mentre lei provava a pulire.

Steam (ST): Beato looked up...above the door of the chapel. There was a relief displayed over an arch.
Umineko Project (UP): Beato looked up......above the door of the chapel.{n}There was a relief displayed over an arch.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato looked up...above the door of the chapel. There was a relief displayed over an arch.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトが見上げるのは、……礼拝堂の扉の上。アーチ上に掲げられている、レリーフだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ベアトが見上げるのは、……礼拝堂の扉の上。{n}アーチ上に掲げられている、レリーフだった。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beato olhou para cima......acima da porta da capela.{n}Havia um relevo exibido sobre um arco.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵抬頭仰望的是，……禮拜堂的門的上方。{n}位於拱門之上的，浮雕。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lì c'erano scritte parole in inglese.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): ""You will be blessed only at a probability of a quadrillion to one". ...Heheh. So, you thought that was the probability of someone solving this riddle...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "‘You will be blessed only at a probability of a Quadrillion to one’. .........Heheh. So, you thought that was the probability of someone solving this riddle...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "'You will be blessed only at a probability of a quadrillion to one'. ......Heheh. So, you thought that was the probability of someone solving this riddle...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「“お前は千兆分の一の確率でしか、祝福されない”、か。………ふふん。あの謎を解ける者が現れる確率を、そなたは、千兆という名の奇跡に見立てたのか…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「“お前は千兆分の一の確率でしか、祝福されない”、か。………ふふん。あの謎を解ける者が現れる確率を、そなたは、千兆という名の奇跡に見立てたのか…」
Russian (RU): "'Благословлён ты будешь лишь в вероятности один к квадриллиону'. ......Хе‐хех. Так вот какова, по‐твоему, вероятность того, что эту загадку разгадают?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‘Você será abençoado apenas na probabilidade de um em um Quatrilião’. .........Heheh. Então, você pensou que essa era a probabilidade de alguém resolver este enigma...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「“你只有千兆分之一的概率，獲得祝福”，麼？………哼哼。汝是把出現解開此謎者的概率，比作了名為千兆的奇跡麼…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「“你只有千兆分之一的概率，获得祝福”，么？………哼哼。汝是把出现解开此谜者的概率，比作了名为千兆的奇迹么…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "‘You will be blessed only at a probability of a quadrillion to one’. ‘Sarai benedetto soltanto con la probabilità di uno su un milione di miliardi’. ... Heheh. Quindi pensavi che quella fosse la probabilità che qualcuno risolvesse quest'enigma...?"

Steam (ST): This chapel was built long ago.
Umineko Project (UP): This chapel was built long ago.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): この礼拝堂が建てられたのは、ずいぶん昔のことだ。
Russian (RU): Эту часовню построили давным‐давно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esta capela foi construída muito tempo atrás.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這座禮拜堂，是在很久以前所建。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这座礼拜堂，是在很久以前所建。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa cappella fu costruita molto tempo fa.

Steam (ST): If there is a device like the one I imagine, ...Kinzo must have prepared that epitaph riddle many decades ago.
Umineko Project (UP): If there is a mechanism like the one I imagine, ......Kinzo must have prepared that epitaph riddle many decades ago.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If there is a device like the one I imagine, ......Kinzo must have prepared that epitaph riddle many decades ago.
PC Japanese (JP): もし、妾の想像する通りの仕掛けがあるとしたら、……金蔵は、数十年の昔から、あの碑文の謎を用意していたことになる。
Russian (RU): Если здесь есть такой механизм, как я представляю...... Кинзо, должно быть, подготовил загадку эпитафии много десятилетий назад.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se tem um mecanismo parecido com o que imaginei, ......o Kinzo deve ter preparado o enigma do epitáfio há muitas décadas atrás.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果，那機關和妾身想像的一樣，……那金藏即是從幾十年前，就已經準備好了那個碑文之謎。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果，那机关和妾身想象的一样，……那金藏即是从几十年前，就已经准备好了那个碑文之谜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se c'è un congegno come quello che immagino... Kinzo deve aver preparato questo enigma dell'epigrafe molti decenni fa.

Steam (ST): He must have been planning to use it as a ceremony for choosing a fitting successor all that time.
Umineko Project (UP): He must have been planning to use it as a ritual for choosing a fitting successor all this time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He must have been planning to use it as a ceremony for choosing a fitting successor all that time.
PC Japanese (JP): いつの日にか、自分の後を継ぐに相応しい者を選ぶ儀式に使おうと、ずっと寝かし続けていた仕掛けに違いあるまい。
Russian (RU): Он наверняка всё то время планировал использовать её как ритуал для выбора достойного преемника.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele deveria ter passado todo esse tempo planejando usá‐lo como ritual para escolher um sucessor adequado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 毫無疑問，這是一個，為在將來某天選出配當自己後繼者之人所用的，一直留至今日的機關。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毫无疑问，这是一个，为在将来某天选出配当自己后继者之人所用的，一直留至今日的机关。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Deve aver avuto da sempre l'idea di usarlo come cerimonia per scegliere un successore adatto.

Steam (ST): ...However, that ceremony is now a ceremony to open the door to the Golden Land and to my resurrection.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, that ritual is now a ritual to open the door to the Golden Land and to my resurrection.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......However, that ceremony is now a ceremony to open the door to the Golden Land and to my resurrection.
PC Japanese (JP): ……もっとも、その儀式は今や、黄金郷への扉を開く、復活の儀式であるが。
Russian (RU): ......Однако сейчас это ритуал открытия дверей в Золотую Землю и моего возрождения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas esse ritual é agora um ritual para abrir as portas da Terra Dourada, bem como a minha ressurreição.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過說到底，這個儀式，現在乃是成了打開通往黃金鄉的大門的，復活的儀式。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过说到底，这个仪式，现在乃是成了打开通往黄金乡的大门的，复活的仪式。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia, quella cerimonia è ora una cerimonia per aprire la porta della Terra Dorata e per la mia resurrezione.

Steam (ST): When I snapped my fingers, the ground bulged, and several snake-like dead trees sprouted up.
Umineko Project (UP): When I snapped my fingers, the ground bulged, and several dead trees sprouted out of it, curving and twisting like snakes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I snapped my fingers, the ground bulged, and several snake-like dead trees sprouted up.
PC Japanese (JP): パチリと指を鳴らすと、目の前の地面が膨れ上がり、そこから朽木が大蛇のように何本も生えてくる。
Russian (RU): Когда я щёлкнула пальцами, земля вздулась, и выросло несколько змееподобных мёртвых деревьев.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando estalei meus dedos, o chão abaloou‐se e diversas árvores mortas brotaram dele, curvando‐se e torcendo‐se como cobras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “啪”地打了個響指，眼前地面鼓起，從那長出了如大蛇般的好幾條枯朽樹幹。
Chinese Simplified (CN): “啪”地打了个响指，眼前地面鼓起，从那长出了如大蛇般的好几条枯朽树干。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando schioccai le dita, la terra si gonfiò e spuntarono secchi alberi come serpenti.

Steam (ST): They twisted around each other to form a ladder, which leaned itself against the door.
Umineko Project (UP): They twisted around each other to form a ladder, which leaned itself against the door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They twisted around each other to form a ladder, which leaned itself against the door.
PC Japanese (JP): それは絡まり合い、はしごの形となって、扉に立てかかった。

Umineko Project (UP): At that moment, even stronger than any delight...was a feeling as though I'd entered a place I wasn't supposed to be...

PC Japanese (JP): 私の似合わないドレス姿を、色々と笑われるだろうと思っていたが、……彼女はまったく茶化さなかった。
Russian (RU): Я думала, что это не совсем подходящее мне платье приведёт ко множеству шуток...... но она надо мной не засмеялась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu pensei que o vestido, que realmente não combinava comigo, fosse acarretar em muitas piadas, ......mas ela não riu de mim uma única vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 本以為我這身不搭調的禮服裝，多半會受到種種取笑，……但她卻完全沒開玩笑。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pensai che questo scherzo, che non era davvero adatto a me, avrebbe portato ad un sacco di battute... ma lei non rise affatto.

Steam (ST): On the contrary, when she saw me, ...her expression had turned stern, as though a long-awaited day had finally come.
Umineko Project (UP): On the contrary, when she saw me, ......her expression had turned stern, as though a long‐awaited day had finally come.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On the contrary, when she saw me, ......her expression had turned stern, as though a long-awaited day had finally come.
PC Japanese (JP): それどころか、私の姿を見て、……まるで、来るべき日がようやく来たとでも言うような、厳かな表情をしているのだった。
Russian (RU): Напротив, когда она увидела меня...... в её выражении появилась строгость, словно наконец настал долгожданный день.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pelo contrário, quando ela me viu, ......a sua expressão ficou séria, como se um tão aguardado dia finalmente tivesse chegado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 豈止如此，看著我這副樣子，……簡直就像是在說“該來的那天終於來了”般，擺著一副嚴肅的表情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 岂止如此，看着我这副样子，……简直就像是在说“该来的那天终于来了”般，摆着一副严肃的表情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al contrario, quando mi vide... la sua espressione divenne rigida, come se il giorno tanto atteso, fosse finalmente arrivato.

Steam (ST): ...My heart raced.
Umineko Project (UP): ......My heart raced.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……心臓が高鳴る。
Russian (RU): ......Моё сердце заколотилось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Meu coração acelerou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……心臟跳得砰砰響。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……心脏跳得砰砰响。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il mio cuore accelerò.

Steam (ST): Supposedly, anyone should have been able to solve the epitaph. There shouldn't be anything strange about me solving it...
Umineko Project (UP): It wasn't supposed to matter who solved the epitaph. There shouldn't be anything strange about me solving it......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Supposedly, anyone should have been able to solve the epitaph. There shouldn't be anything strange about me solving it......
PC Japanese (JP): 碑文は、誰が解いても良かったはず。私が解いても、おかしくはないはず……。
Russian (RU): Кто‐то должен был суметь разгадать эпитафию. Не должно быть ничего странного в том, что я разгадала её......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não deveria importar quem resolvesse o epitáfio. Não deveria ter nada de estranho no fato de eu ter resolvido ele......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 碑文，理應是由誰解開都無妨的。理應是，就算由我來解開，也不會有任何好奇怪的……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 碑文，理应是由谁解开都无妨的。理应是，就算由我来解开，也不会有任何好奇怪的……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In teoria, quindi sarebbe stato capace di risolvere l'epigrafe. Non ci dovrebbe essere niente di strano in me che la risolvo...

Steam (ST): Genji and the others kept wearing serious expressions, ...and that, along with everything else, made this feel like some sort of grand ceremony.
Umineko Project (UP): Everyone else maintained solemn expressions, ......and that, along with everything else, made this feel like some sort of grand ceremony.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The others kept wearing meek expressions, ......and that, along with everything else, made this feel like some sort of grand ceremony.
PC Japanese (JP): 源次たちは、ずっと神妙な顔をしていて、……これも含めて全てが、厳かな式典のようだった。
Russian (RU): С их лиц не пропадали кроткие выражения...... что вместе со всем остальным производило впечатление некой торжественной церемонии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos mantiveram expressões solenes, ......e isso, junto com todo o resto que se seguiu, fez com que parecesse algum tipo de cerimônia importante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可源次他們，一直擺著副規矩嚴肅的臉，……包括此在內的一切的一切，全部恰似一場莊嚴的儀式。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可源次他们，一直摆着副规矩严肃的脸，……包括此在内的一切的一切，全部恰似一场庄严的仪式。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gli altri continuarono ad avere espressioni umili... e questo, insieme a tutto il resto, la faceva sembrare una sorta di cerimonia solenne.

Steam (ST): The suffocating silence continued.
Umineko Project (UP): The suffocating silence continued.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The suffocating silence continued.
PC Japanese (JP): 息苦しい沈黙が、ずっと続く。
Russian (RU): Удушающая тишина продолжалась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O sufocante silêncio continuou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 叫人喘不過氣來的沉默，沒完沒了地繼續著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 叫人喘不过气来的沉默，没完没了地继续着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il silenzio soffocante continuò.

Umineko Project (UP): Eventually, the door opened, and Genji peeked out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eventually, the door opened, and Genji peeked out.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eventualmente, a porta se abriu e Genji colocou a cabeça para fora.

Umineko Project (UP): What expression should I wear as I go in...? How should I greet him...?{n}I don't have a clue...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): What expression should I wear as I go in...? How should I greet him...? I don't have a clue...

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo's eyes were already red with crying. When he saw me, he groaned with wonder.

Steam (ST): So, humans seek forgiveness while they still live. However, in most cases, the person capable of granting such forgiveness is no longer on this Earth.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, humans seek forgiveness while they still live. However, in most cases, there are none in this world capable of giving such forgiveness.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我知道你叫不出口…。……我沒有對你做過，任何像個爸爸的事。並且你也是，不知父親為何物地長大的。……我明白，這是句很難叫出口的話。並且還清楚，我沒有要求你這麼叫的資格。………但是，在清楚這些的基礎上，……我還是要請求你……。……只要你聽了我這個請求，……我就再也沒有任何遺憾了……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我知道你叫不出口…。……我没有对你做过，任何像个爸爸的事。并且你也是，不知父亲为何物地长大的。……我明白，这是句很难叫出口的话。并且还清楚，我没有要求你这么叫的资格。………但是，在清楚这些的基础上，……我还是要请求你……。……只要你听了我这个请求，……我就再也没有任何遗憾了……」

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……あんたがそうしたいというなら、私は何の異論もない。金蔵さんの遺言は、あんたに全てを委ねる、だ。そのあんたがそれを望むなら、私たちには何の文句もない」
Russian (RU): "......Если вы этого хотите, я не возражаю. Кинзо доверил всё вам. Если вы желаете так сделать, никто из нас не станет жаловаться."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Se é isso que você quer, eu não tenho nenhuma objeção. O testamento do Kinzo‐san confiou tudo a você. Se é isso o que deseja fazer, nenhum de nós irá reclamar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……既然你想要這樣，那我就沒有任何異議。金藏先生的遺言說了，把一切都交給你。既然這位你想要這樣，那我們是不會有任何怨言的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……既然你想要这样，那我就没有任何异议。金藏先生的遗言说了，把一切都交给你。既然这位你想要这样，那我们是不会有任何怨言的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Se è questo ciò che vuoi, non ho obiezioni. Il testamento di Kinzo-san lascia tutto a te. Se questo è ciò che vuoi, nessuno di noi si lamenterà."

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): "You say "exactly the same as it was", ...but do you really mean exactly the same...? With no differences at all...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "You say "exactly the same as it was", ......but do you really mean exactly the same...? With no differences at all...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You say 'exactly the same as it was', ......but do you really mean exactly the same...? With no differences at all...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「これまでと同じように、と言いますけれど…。……本当にこれまでと同じように、この島で生活を続けられるのですか…？　これまでと、何も変わらず…？」
Russian (RU): "Вы сказали 'точно так же, как было'...... но и вправду имели в виду то же самое?.. Без каких‐либо различий?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você disse "exatamente como era", ......mas realmente quer dizer exatamente igual...? Sem nenhuma diferença...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「儘管您說了，和之前一樣…。……但您真的能和以前一樣地在這個島上，繼續生活嗎…？與這之前，毫無任何改變…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「尽管您说了，和之前一样…。……但您真的能和以前一样地在这个岛上，继续生活吗…？与这之前，毫无任何改变…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ha detto ‘esattamente com'era’... ma intende davvero esattamente lo stesso...? Senza alcuna differenza...?"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Yes. ...We'll keep this a secret. ...This place and the gold will be sealed away. If I need money, I'll ask you about it then. ...That's enough for me."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes. .........We'll keep this a secret. ......This place and the gold will be sealed away. If I need money, I'll ask you about it then. .........That's enough for me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yes. ......We'll keep this a secret. ......This place and the gold will be sealed away. If I need money, I'll ask you about it then. ......That's enough for me."
PC Japanese (JP): 「はい。………今夜のことは秘密にします。……ここも黄金も封印します。もしも、お金が必要になったら、その時、改めて相談することにします。………私には、それで充分です。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「はい。………今夜のことは秘密にします。……ここも黄金も封印します。もしも、お金が必要になったら、その時、改めて相談することにします。………私には、それで充分です」
Russian (RU): "Да. ......Мы сохраним всё в тайне. ......Это место и золото будут запечатаны. Если мне понадобятся деньги, я скажу вам. ......Этого для меня достаточно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. .........Manteremos isto em segredo. ......Este lugar e seu ouro permanecerão selados. Caso eu precise de dinheiro, pedirei a você. .........É o suficiente para mim."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是的。………對今晚的事保密。……把這裡、把黃金全都封印起來。如果，我需要錢了，那時我會再來跟各位商量的。………對我來說，這樣就夠了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是的。………对今晚的事保密。……把这里、把黄金全都封印起来。如果，我需要钱了，那时我会再来跟各位商量的。………对我来说，这样就够了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì. ... Lo manterremo segreto. ... Questo posto e l'oro saranno sigillati. {n}Se avrò bisogno di denaro, ve lo farò sapere. ... Per me è sufficiente."

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "As you wish. The device leading to this place and the key both belong to you. ...And all of us swear to keep the events of this night a secret. ...Krauss-sama will be the Successor, ...but in my heart, you will be the only true Successor."
Umineko Project (UP): "As you wish. The mechanism leading to this place and the key both belong to you. ......And all of us swear to keep the events of this night a secret. .........Krauss‐sama will be the successor, ......but in my heart, you will be the only true successor."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "As you wish. The device leading to this place and the key both belong to you. ......And all of us swear to keep the events of this night a secret. ......Krauss-sama will be the successor, ......but in my heart, you will be the only true successor."
PC Japanese (JP): 「畏まりました。ここに至る仕掛けも鍵も、全てあなただけのものでございます。……そして今夜のことは私共一同、秘密にすることを誓います。………次期当主は蔵臼さまとなられますが、……私の中では、真の当主様は、あなただけでございます。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「畏まりました。ここに至る仕掛けも鍵も、全てあなただけのものでございます。……そして今夜のことは私共一同、秘密にすることを誓います。………次期当主は蔵臼さまとなられますが、……私の中では、真の当主様は、あなただけでございます」
Russian (RU): "Как пожелаете. Механизм, ведущий сюда, и ключ принадлежат вам. ......И все мы клянёмся сохранить в тайне события этой ночи. ......Преемником будет господин Краусс...... но для меня единственным настоящим преемником будете вы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Como desejar. O mecanismo que leva até aqui e também a chave, agora pertencem a você. ......E todos nós juramos manter os eventos desta noite em segredo. .........O Krauss‐sama será o sucessor, ......mas no meu coração, o verdadeiro sucessor é você."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「遵命。一路上的機關、鑰匙，全都只屬於您。……然後，我們一同起誓，對今晚的事保密。………雖然下任當主成了藏臼先生，……但在我的心中，真正的當主大人，只有您一位。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「遵命。一路上的机关、钥匙，全都只属于您。……然后，我们一同起誓，对今晚的事保密。………虽然下任当主成了藏臼先生，……但在我的心中，真正的当主大人，只有您一位。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Come desidera. Sia il congegno che porta a questo posto che la chiave appartengono a lei. ... E tutti noi giuriamo di mantenere il segreto su questa notte. ... Krauss-sama sarà il successore... ma nel mio cuore, il vero successore è lei."
